name: Hell's Playground (TJ Cioffe)
description:
Hell's Playground

Move/Jump with WASD/Arrow/Spacebar keys.  

Assignment: create a single-screen (no scrolling) platformer; can contain multiple levels utilizing repeat game mechanics.  I tend to make my platformers overly difficult since it's such a well-travelled genre, so beauty may be in the eye of the beholder on this one!

GAM 606, MFA in Game Development at the Academy of Art University.   
Platformer controller code via Akashenen. Platformer sprite assets via Pixel Frog.  

Further information available at onewinter.net.
